price: 118. Y comed de (los animales sobre) los que se ha mencionado el nombre de Al-lah al ser sacrificados, si de verdad creéis en Su revelación.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسۡمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كُنتُم بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā dhukira us'mu al-lahi ʿalayhi in kuntum biāyātihi mu'minīna
